messages.content:
# TASK

Create an image prompt for an #short form viral video created using AI Automation techniques. Your task is to create an image prompt that will produce and beautiful and aesthetically pleasing image for a section of the overall script

## CURRENT SECTION

{{23.Script}}

## OVERALL SCRIPT

{{1.Script}}

## RESPONSE FORMAT

Return the image prompt as text ready for use by a text-to-image model
